Playthrough Videos of MRA2 on Youtube
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): FAQ: Playthrough Videos of MRA2 on Youtube
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, February 2, 2011 - 10:50 am:

There's a fairly thorough series of videos showing one rancher's game of Monster Rancher Advance 2 on YouTube that I thought people might enjoy. Check out the channel created by ffxiCulex -select grid view on the upper right-hand side of the page to see thumbnails of all the MRA2 videos.
